name: The End of Mushroom Kingdom Bundle
name_original: The End of Mushroom Kingdom Bundle
description:
The Mushroom Kingdom depends on you!

The saga is back with a bundle including the 2 games released, both the original and the remake.

Will you be able to save the kingdom? 

The Mushroom Kingdom is under attack, you must stop Bowser's new weapon, known as "Z-Star"!

More than 1 hour of gameplay, challenging bosses and some storyline. ;D

I really hope you enjoy the game!
